means: 出汗，流汗( perspire的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He had been working hard and was perspiring profusely.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一直在努力干活,身上大汗淋漓的.

sentence.Network_en: So they " went it lively, " panting and perspiring with the work.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是他们就 “ 痛痛快快地比一比 ” 了,结果比得两个人气喘吁吁、汗流浃背.

sentence.Network_en: Robert Kincaid was perspiring mildly; his top two shirt buttons undone.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗伯特.金凯微微出着汗, 衬衫的头两个扣子解开着.

PerfectNetExp.abs: there was no sign of Prissy so she went back upstairs , sponged Melanie's perspiring body and combed out her long dark hair .可是百里茜连影子也没有，于是她只好回到楼上，用海绵给媚兰擦洗汗淋淋的身子，然后又替她梳理好那一头长长的黑发。
The act or process of perspiring ., 出汗排泄汗液的活动或过程.
perspire 排出, perspiring 人体出汗, perspire 渗出

list.abs: ...perspiration fastness tester 耐汗渍牢度试验机perspiration resistance 耐汗渍persticide residue 农药残留量
大便困难 dyschesia大汗淋漓 profuse perspiration-
医药词... ... 健忘 amnesia 自汗 spontaneous perspiration 气虚自汗 spontaneous sweating due to deficiency of vital energy.
科技词典翻译结果... ... personality test 人格测验 perspiration test 发汗试验 Perthes' test 派翟氏试验; 佩特兹氏试验.

entry.def: When you perspire, a liquid comes out on the surface of your skin, because you are hot or frightened.

example.tran: 擦拭他们一直在出汗的额头

auth_sentence.content: Will Oxford be the city of dreaming spires or perspiring dreams for Kevin Pietersen?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Will Oxford be the city of dreaming spires or perspiring dreams for Kevin Pietersen?

auth_sentence.content: He propped one foot on the toe of the other to alleviate the rhythmic ache and found himself perspiring.

auth_sentence.content: She's got one hand wrapped around a perspiring Corona, the other resting on her bad leg, which is slightly bent at the knee.
